response.overview: ‘There Are Lights’ is set in Whitby, North Yorkshire. It tells the story of Menna and her father Farouq, who have recently moved from Egypt to Whitby. The two are finding it a challenge to integrate, with Menna throwing herself into the gothic identity of her new home, and her father becoming even more removed from it, and subsequently, his daughter. On Halloween night, the two finally have to overcome their differences and learn to understand one another.
response.title: There Are Lights
